title: Dairy Hill Ice Cream
description: A small 100% vegetarian (with vegan options) ice cream parlor located in Hillsdale. Always has two coconut milk ice cream flavors (chocolate and vanilla) to use in milkshakes, cones and sundaes. Offers specials like a s'mores sundae and Reese's cup/banana milkshake, or you can build your own. Lots of toppings and sauces; vegans please inquire. Gluten free options are available, such as brownies.
